Name: Columns™ III
About the game: Arrange the blocks of jewels falling from the top of the screen. If three or more jewels of the same colour are lined up vertically, horizontally, or diagonally, they disappear. Don’t allow them to pile up to the top, or you will lose the game.
Meta Title: Columns™ III: Oct 26, 2010, SEGA and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Columns™ III? Check out the release date (Oct 26, 2010), developer insights from SEGA, and a complete game summary.
